name: Pete's Park VR
description:
This is the Virtual Reality Edition of my first game. You can find the NON-VR Desktop Version here: PETE'S PARK DESKTOP VERSION.

Your buddy's car breaks down but he was able to pull into the parking lot of the now-abandoned and defunded Pete's Park. He gives you a call and you head over to help him out but when you show up, he's nowhere to be found. Explore the abandoned park and find your buddy!

FEATURES:

TESTED ON OCULUS QUEST 2 / RIFT S

TWO ENDINGS

ONE HILARIOUS EASTER EGG

INCLUDING A CAMERA HEIGHT ISSUE I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FIX

Depending on your playstyle, this game could take anywhere between 15 - 45 minutes. 

DISCLAIMER:

My project files were corrupted so unfortunately this will never receive any fixes if issues are encountered. It has been tested on a Quest 2 and Rift S and seemingly worked pretty well.  Enjoy this game for what it is: A janky VR edition of an already janky game. 

Controls can be found in game.

Credits:

Unreal Retro Shaders / DaveFace

Voice Acting from Bazookya over at twitch.tv/bazookya

Shoutouts to Simpleflips

All character models, animations, and spaghetti code done by me.
